title: Social Curriculum Design and Sequencing Based on Graph Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social science concepts and foundational digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners perform projects by leveraging prior knowledge of educational content in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment. Continuous feedback is provided through formative assessments.

learning_goals: They can visualize and analyze prerequisite relationships between learning contents using graph-based tools
They can design a curriculum that systematically sequences core concepts in social studies disciplines
They can diagnose and correct logical errors occurring during curriculum development using network analysis tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
